marklogic.body: You people live in a fool's paradise. It's looked like zimmerman is the Cold blooded racial profiling murderer that he is. He knew jack about anything Taryvon before he decided the young man was an "a..hole" on drugs, a "fking COON" that was up to no good, and deserved to be slaughtered. Do you or your kids use tobacco, smoke weed, hash, use Coke, heroin, morphine, crack, meth, pain pills, acid, uppers, downers, sniff glue, drink booze, reds, blacks,Â yellow jackets,Â mad dogsÂ .... you name it? How about Zimmerman, what was he on that night when he slaughtered Trayvon? He is guilty as sin, and he better hope he's charged and sent to jail. If not beÂ afraid, be very afraid for him. Oh, and you don't what zim was on that night do you? Trayvon was popping skittles, drinking tea.Â
